page.title: 01Eaton Under Heywood
page.content: This block includes Ape Dale beyond Eaton brook. Wenlock Edge, Hope Dale & Little London Hill which is part of View Edge. The population is widely scattered. Ticklerton, Middlehope and Harton are little more than two neighbouring farmsteads. Eaton itself now consists of a church, an ex- rectory and a large farmstead. Farming is the major occupation, and includes dairying & intensive poultry down in Ape Dale, sheep & beef cattle in Hope Dale, & much more cereal & fodder crops growing around the View Edge. The large area of woodland on the steep (scarp) slope of Wenlock Edge is mainly deciduous but also includes Christmas tree production. Lillichope Estate commercial woodlands extend to several hundred acres on the highest land around Upper Lillichope.
